lead_paragraph: MARKOE--Victoria, on June 6, 2016. Beloved wife of the late David. Devoted mother of Anthony and Casey, and mother-in-law of Mario Gonzalez and Rhoda. Cherished grandmother of Alexander and Sammy. Services today, 1pm, at "The Riverside," 76th St. and Amsterdam Ave. 1/3
